mapper.update: update pq_agency_user set agency_class_id = #{agencyClassId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, agency_class_id, user_id, role, state, updated_time, created_time from pq_agency_user
